text: Cratosolpuga is an extinct genus of solifuge from the Early Cretaceous Araripe Basin of Brazil. It contains the single species Cratosolpuga wunderlichi. The genus is known from and named after the Crato Formation. == References == Category:Extinct arachnids Category:Solifugae genera Category:Aptian life Category:Early Cretaceous animals of South America Category:Cretaceous Brazil Category:Fossils of Brazil Category:Fossil taxa described in 1996
title: Cratosolpuga
